title: Looking for top laner
body: Needs to be rational thinker and looking to improve with the team, org Byeol Gaming

replies.body: Im a pretty decent top laner maining rumble and kled
Make sure they don't play yasuo
Add me. I am Riven main - Top laner{{champion:92}} .
Also, subscribe to me on YT - LeagueOfRaymondd .
Add me Xenomazul. Top lane main.
